title: Training Program for Developing Mobile Applications to Prevent Pressure Injuries for Elderly Care Providers

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Elderly Care Knowledge and Practical Hands-On Experience
context.additional_context: Learners are current professionals familiar with digital tools in BYOD environments, requiring project-based assessment to verify app development and application skills

learning_goals: Learners can explain core theories related to pressure ulcer prevention (causes, stages, vulnerable areas).
Learners can apply the key features of the mobile application LPPrev (notification system, record management, prevention guidelines) in practical settings.
Learners can propose usability improvement strategies for a pressure ulcer prevention application prototype through team collaboration.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
